rooms.description: Spacious living area with natural lighting and eco-friendly design.
Modern kitchen incorporating energy-saving appliances and sustainable materials.
Dining area adjacent to the living room for social gatherings.
Master bedroom with a view and private balcony, designed following Vastu principles.
Secondary bedroom ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Additional bedroom designed to complement the master bedroom.
Bathroom with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly design elements.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor with a separate entrance for easy access.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to adhere to Vastu principles, ensuring a welcoming flow of energy.
Large windows for natural lighting and ventilation in the living room.
Energy-efficient door connecting kitchen to dining area.

additional_features.description: Large garden space integrated around the villa for eco-friendly living and natural cooling.
Home theater area planned on the upper floor with soundproofing and sustainable design features.
